attributes.action: Make Euthanasia legal in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: This is something I feel passionate about. More health conditions are being diagnosed and there are quite a few that cannot be treated. Euthanasia should be possible where it’s established there is no known successful treatment for a condition and sufferers find it hard to get on with day to day life, as in Belgium.
attributes.background: More and more people are suffering from terminal illnesses or health conditions. Individuals should have the right the end their life, when they want to. Why should people tell them, they can't?

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Sir Lindsay Hoyle MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Chorley
